name: Chocolate Mud Pie No-Bake Cheesecake
description: Thank you to one of our Epicure consultants for this recipe!

ingredients.name: prepared 9" graham pie shell or pre-baked crust

preparation: Using a stand mixer or hand mixer, beat cream cheese with mix on medium-high speed until smooth. Scrape the sides of the bowl as needed. Gradually add cream, whipping until soft peaks form.
Fill into prepared pie shell; smooth top.
Chill until set and ready to serve. Add toppings before serving, if desired.
tips: Instead of making your cheesecake in a pie shell, try petites! Spoon cheesecake filling into Perfect Petites, chill, and enjoy!
